comment: Thinking to Step Down as Chair of the DNC?! Absolutely, step down, sir! Step Down from the Election for AG in Minnesota......stop subjecting the people of Minnesota to the COVERUP of your VIOLENT BEATDOWN, Mr. Ellison. Be a MAN, and get the help you need for your TEMPER.

comment: Don't use that terminology for Muslims. It is so offensive on so many levels and it's people like you that give the world a bad reputation.
